channel.title: Medvedev on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Medvedev on Rusland 1

item.title: Photo: Igor Mukhin
item.description: “I felt that the time of ‘change’ had come, and I needed to go and shoot” (Flashbak, 2018). To start: explore Igor Mukhin’s work in the series Смотри в тишине (Look in silence). Presented by MAMM (= Multimedia Art Museum, Moscow).

item.title: Putin 3x
item.description: Three portraits Putin viewed from different angles: three portraits from 2017-2018. Two are long (American and British), one is very long (Russian, with subtitles). Links to shorter clips are at the bottom. The Power of Putin – BBC Documentary (Astrobum, 2017, 43 m)
